title: Resolve Billing Dispute - Double Charge
description: A customer claims they were charged twice for a single order.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's order and payment transaction history.
Analyze the transaction logs and confirm that two identical payment authorizations were captured.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that a system glitch caused a duplicate charge.

tasks.description: Issue a refund for the duplicate charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully refunds the extra amount to the customer.
